title: Intel compiler fails with linking error

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
Intel 19.1.0 installs successfully, but fails with linker errors when building simple C programs e.g.

```
$ icc hello.c                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
ld: cannot find -limf                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
ld: cannot find -lsvml                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
ld: cannot find -lirng                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
ld: cannot find -lipgo                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
ld: cannot find -ldecimal                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
ld: cannot find -lcilkrts                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
ld: cannot find -lirc                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
ld: cannot find -lsvml
```

The needed libraries are in `<root>/compilers_and_libraries_2020.0.166/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin`, and the spack-generated module appends that path to `LD_LIBRARY_PATH`. I've found that putting the search path in `LIBRARY_PATH` solves the issue e.g.

```
$ spack load intel@19.1.0
$ export LIBRARY_PATH=`<root>/compilers_and_libraries_2020.0.166/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin:$LIBRARY_PATH`
$ icc hello.c
```
